SummaryEnglish: Deemo, a mysterious lonely character that plays a piano in a castle. One day, a girl who has lost her memory comes falling from the sky. A gentle, ephemeral story of love spun by Deemo, the girl, the mystical residents of the castle, and a tree that grows with the sound of the piano.
Aliases: Deemo Movie: Sakura no Oto - Anata no Kanadeta Oto ga, Ima mo Hibiku
